normalized: more than two weeks after that.
rinko-nee, shizuru-san and i had done our best to erase our presence for the sake of the force infiltration.
that being said, it had been an enjoyable daily life in its own way, usually getting to go to rinko-nee's room at night, eat her home cooking, and sleep alongside her until morning.
as we had both pledged, i hadn't had sex with rinko-nee even once.
but conversely, because we didn't indulge in our lusts with each other, i took it positively, as a test of our love.
on the other hand, shizuru-san, who had declared herself number three, had been amazingly greedy, and wanted me almost daily.
although seized with feelings of guilt, i had worked hard at sex with shizuru-san in the staff toilets in the afternoons, in order to diminish my energy a bit before i met rinko-nee.
a beautiful woman on either side of me―didn't please me very much.
every day was like a tightrope walk when it came to how soon rinko-nee would find out.
that would also end today.
the day for carrying out the force infiltration had finally arrived.
almost two o'clock in the morning.
night was unusually quiet at seishuu academy.
the moon wasn't out tonight, either.
it was ideal infiltration weather.
if tonight's mission succeeded, our life at seishuu academy would come to an end.
it had been fulfilling in areas unrelated to the mission, such as being able to lose my virginity to shizuru-san, and get together with rinko-nee.
as such, my mental and physical strength were both satisfactory.
i would perform the mission finale without fail, and return home feeling good.
a romantic life with rinko-nee was awaiting me.

name: shizuru
normalized: tatsurou-kun.
good evening.
while i was waiting at the meeting place, shizuru-san appeared first.
not in the suit that i had gotten used to seeing lately, and had taken off a lot.
she was in a taimanin outfit, like me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: evening, shizuru-san.

name: shizuru
normalized: at last, eh?
you fully prepared?

name: tatsurou
normalized: of course.
please leave it to me.

name: shizuru
normalized: looks like you're pretty eager, huh?

name: tatsurou
normalized: yeah.
i've had to wait a long time, after all.

name: shizuru
normalized: fufu, is that the only reason?
shizuru-san tilted her head in a slightly theatrical manner.
a somewhat malicious glint was dancing in the eyes that gazed at me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?

name: shizuru
normalized: tatsurou-kun wasn't, by any chance――
shizuru-san slid up to me soundlessly, and whispered into my ear with a sweet sigh.

name: shizuru
normalized: thinking “i can finally get away from that tiresome woman today”?

name: tatsurou
normalized: n, no way!
i wasn't thinking about getting away from shizuru-san!

name: shizuru
normalized: you didn't say a word about me being a tiresome woman, though?

name: tatsurou
normalized: uh…
i was lost for words.
i had never thought of her as tiresome, but i was selfishly thinking “i hope it ends today.

name: shizuru
normalized: you're the worst.
before i realized it, shizuru-san's eyes were fixed on me.
s, scary.

name: tatsurou
normalized: uh, well… that's, um…
a cold sweat broke out on my back.
shizuru-san had been staring at me in silence, but she suddenly breathed a sigh.

name: shizuru
normalized: no, no, i'm kidding.
you don't think like that.
i believed that from the start.
she smiled, as if her scary face from a moment earlier had been nothing, and poked my petrified self on the forehead with her finger.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
eh?

name: shizuru
normalized: after all, it was a fling, a fling before the mission!
for you too, right?

name: tatsurou
normalized: w, well… i wouldn't call it a fling… uh, i have rinko-nee and yukikaze, but… shizuru-san's also…

name: shizuru
normalized: it's fine, it's fine.
i have no intention of imposing on you until after this mission's finished.

name: shizuru
normalized: it's just, you were making an overly happy-looking face, so i started wanting to be a little mean.

name: tatsurou
normalized: is that so…?
when that was said by shizuru-san with a smile, i had no problems with it at all, but it still hurt a little.
“i see.
i was a fling, huh?

name: shizuru
normalized: making a sad-looking face… you really are a bad boy.
shizuru-san looked at my dispirited self like she was amused, and

name: shizuru
normalized: i'm not especially going to pursue you, but this isn't farewell.
i'm your first woman, after all.
don't forget that, okay?

name: tatsurou
normalized: of course i won't forget.
shizuru-san will be a lifelong memory.
i nodded as hard as i could.

name: shizuru
normalized: ah, how cruel.
saying memory… you're giving me the ex-girlfriend treatment already.
hmm, i see.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
that's not it.
i didn't mean that when i said memory.
i meant, the thing with shizuru-san will be an irreplaceable experience, or maybe i should say――
i started explaining in a panic, at which point shizuru-san began laughing again.

name: shizuru
normalized: yeah, yeah, i know.
as the woman who took tatsurou-kun's virginity, i'm looking forward to seeing what kind of man you become after this.
we'll partner up again at some point, you know?

name: tatsurou
normalized: y, yeah.

name: shizuru
normalized: of course, at that time――fufu, i'll find that out with my body.
shizuru-san let out an excited-sounding seductive voice, and gently rubbed my crotch with her soft hand.

name: tatsurou
normalized: uhh…
it seemed to be erect, even though this was before a mission.
i reflexively covered my groin.

name: shizuru
normalized: you'll have to do something about getting aroused easily.
there's a mission after this.
understand?

name: tatsurou
normalized: hey.
please, don't be unreasonable.

name: shizuru
normalized: fat chance, huh?
well, that's why i'm looking forward to seeing what happens after this point, though.
you were a virgin until recently, tatsurou-kun.

name: tatsurou
normalized: uu, please give me a break already.
this was the same as our usual afternoon liaisons.
it was entirely at shizuru-san's pace.
i couldn't be more pathetic.
perhaps i would never be a match for her in my entire life.

name: shizuru
normalized: well, i've also gotten relaxed from teasing tatsurou-kun… by the way, your onee-san's late, isn't she?

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
rinko-nee?
i looked at my watch.
quite a long amount of time had already passed since we were supposed to meet.
rinko-nee, who was strict about time, couldn't possibly be late, much less be late arriving for a mission.

name: tatsurou
normalized: you suppose something happened?

name: shizuru
normalized: could be…
shizuru-san nodded with a serious face, like a different person from when she was teasing me.
armed guards were patrolling the forest where we were hiding now, which amounted to a boundary wall for the research facility.
it wasn't time for their patrol right now.
i didn't think that rinko-nee would be discovered by guards like those, but some unexpected trouble might have occurred.
it was also fully conceivable that she had been attacked by that perverted rubber woman, whom i, shizuru-san and rinko-nee had all encountered once.
we had investigated a lot while we were hiding out, and had even sought help from the village, but that person's true identity was still a mystery.

we didn't know why she had appeared to meet us and then disappeared with perfect timing, on the day when we first entered the research facility, and then immediately after rinko-nee had arrived, and the three of us had had our preparatory meeting.
however, even though we didn't know, i was apprehensive that she might come out again tonight.

name: shizuru
normalized: there's nothing for it.
i'll have a quick look.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i'm going too.
i'm worried about rinko-nee.

name: shizuru
normalized: no.
it's not like we've determined that something did happen to your sister.

name: shizuru
normalized: i'll need backup for the eventuality that she and i miss each other.
you stay here.

name: tatsurou
normalized: but, what if she's been attacked by that rubber woman, or something?

name: shizuru
normalized: i'm taking that into account too.
even if you and i are there, we'll just be a hindrance to her taking on that rubber woman.

name: shizuru
normalized: besides, in the unlikely event that your onee-san has already been hurt by the rubber woman, we'll need to consider immediate withdrawal.
you understand, right?

name: tatsurou
normalized: …yes.
i nodded.
what shizuru-san said was natural.

name: shizuru
normalized: i'll come back in 30 minutes.
if your onee-san arrives before that, or i accompany her, we'll carry out the force infiltration as planned.

name: tatsurou
normalized: and if neither of you come back?

name: shizuru
normalized: i don't want to think about that too much, but assume that your onee-san and i have been defeated by the rubber woman, and withdraw.
this is an order.

name: tatsurou
normalized: understood.
be careful.
'cause i plan to have sex with shizuru-san again.

name: shizuru
normalized: there's a good line for sending a woman off.
here i go.
shizuru-san made a bold smile, and suddenly disappeared into the night.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （rinko-nee…）
before i knew it, the air had started to become breezy.
the wind that passed through the nighttime forest was making an eerie sound.
even if rinko-nee were fighting somewhere right now, it definitely wouldn't reach my ears because of that.
even so, i felt around through the wind as i continued waiting motionlessly in that spot, alone.
the state of the wind had changed.
someone was approaching.
there were two people.
women.
i recognized these shapes.
thank goodness.
it was shizuru-san and rinko-nee.
having been patiently suppressing my presence all this time, i breathed a slow sigh of relief.

name: tatsurou
normalized: rinko-nee, shizuru-san.
i saw the pair appear through a thicket, and approach me.

name: shizuru
normalized: sorry to keep you waiting, tatsurou-kun.
splendid hiding, as ever.

name: rinko
normalized: sorry, tatsurou.
i was late.
shizuru-san smiled pleasantly and praised me, and rinko-nee spoke like she minded being late.

name: tatsurou
normalized: it's rare for rinko-nee to be late.
what were you doing?
i asked, since the pair looked the same as usual, and it didn't seem like they had fought anyone.

name: rinko
normalized: redeployment of rear support troops.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?

name: rinko
normalized: i'm going to withdraw as soon as tonight's mission ends.
naturally, there's a chance that enemy pursuers will chase after me.

name: rinko
normalized: on that theory, i was deploying taimanin ambush troops, and it took a bit of time――you haven't heard?

name: tatsurou
normalized: this is the first i've heard about that.

name: rinko
normalized: you suggested it before, didn't you?
you said it was because it would be bad if anything happened to me.

normalized: now that you mention it, i did say something like that, didn't i?

name: rinko
normalized: still, i've arranged it.

name: tatsurou
normalized: oh, is that so?
this was a bit of a confusing conversation.
i wondered why she had called for an ambush today, all of a sudden.
and what's more, in secret from me.
it seemed that those doubts had shown on my face, and shizuru-san explained in a strangely happy-sounding voice.

name: shizuru
normalized: i instructed her, because a security system was recently installed at the ambush position.

name: rinko
normalized: that's the way it is.
rinko-nee nodded, looking strangely unsettled.

name: shizuru

normalized: eh?

despite finding that odd, i inquired about the ambush troops for now.

is that so?

i understand your concern, but rinko-chan is a far more able person than you.

shizuru-san looked at us and smiled, then began an explanation.

it was unbelievable, considering the time of the first preparatory meeting, when shizuru-san had provoked rinko-nee, and we had almost been on the verge of carnage.
